blogPost.excerpt: Papercups is an open-source live customer chat app written in Elixir. We are a dev friendly alternative to Intercom and Drift that is highly extensible and customizable. We also have a Slack integration that lets you reply from Slack.
blogPost.body: Papercups is an open-source live customer chat app written in Elixir. We are a dev friendly alternative to Intercom and Drift that is highly extensible and customizable. We also have a Slack integration that lets you reply from Slack.
blogPost.title: Papercups 2.0 - Open source Intercom and Drift alternative
blogPost.author: Kam Leung

localize.description: Papercups 是一个用 Elixir 编写的开源即时客户聊天应用。我们是 Intercom 和 Drift 的友好替代品，具有高度的可扩展性和可定制性。我们还集成了Slack，让您可以在Slack上进行回复。
Papercups 是一個用 Elixir 編寫的開源即時客戶聊天應用。我們是 Intercom 和 Drift 的友好替代品，具有高度的可擴展性和可定製性。我們還集成了Slack，讓您可以在Slack上進行回覆。

previous.excerpt: A complete video translation & hosting workspace that streamlines the transcription, translation, and dubbing workflow. ✅ Auto-transcribe (31 languages) ✅ Auto-translate subtitles (71 languages) ✅ Team collaboration ✅ Global video CDN ✅ Start for FREE!
previous.title: alugha - All-in-one video translation toolkit & hosting

localize.description: 一个完整的视频翻译和托管工作空间，简化了转录、翻译和配音工作流程。✅ 自动转录 (31种语言) ✅ 自动翻译字幕 (71种语言) ✅ 团队协作 ✅ 全球视频CDN ✅ 免费开始!
localize.tagline: 一体化视频翻译工具包和托管

localize.description: 一個完整的視頻翻譯和託管工作空間，簡化了轉錄、翻譯和配音工作流程。✅ 自動轉錄 (31種語言) ✅ 自動翻譯字幕 (71種語言) ✅ 團隊協作 ✅ 全球視頻CDN ✅ 免費開始!
localize.tagline: 一體化視頻翻譯工具包和託管
